title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the model of voting behavior that best reflects most voters’ choice to recall the governor.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the media’s role as a linkage institution might have affected the voting behavior described in part A. The response must be in the context of the scenario.

For Task C, the response must explain how the electoral process for removing Governor Davis is different from the process for removing a sitting president of the United States.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
